version.author: Aaron Cendan
version.changelog: Added User Data field for additional notes The tool now fully supports the following languages, using the Language dropdown in the navigation bar: - English - Spanish - French - German - Italian - Polish - Dutch - Danish - Finnish - Portuguese - Portuguese - Brazil - Chinese - Japanese Language support covers both online and offline modes

version.author: Aaron Cendan
version.changelog: Added User Data field for additional notes The tool now fully supports 13 different languages, using the Language dropdown in the navigation bar Language support covers both online and offline modes Added country sprites for language dropdowns
